verses.verse: The second<WH8145> lot<WH1486> came out<WH3318> for Simeon,<WH8095> even for the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095> according to their families.<WH4940> Their inheritance<WH5159> was in the midst<WH8432> of the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Judah.<WH3063>
They had for their inheritance<WH5159> Beersheba<WH884> (or Sheba<WH7652>), Moladah,<WH4137>
Hazar Shual,<WH2705> Balah,<WH1088> Ezem,<WH6107>
Eltolad,<WH513> Bethul,<WH1329> Hormah,<WH2767>
Ziklag,<WH6860> Beth Marcaboth,<WH1024> Hazar Susah,<WH2701>
Beth Lebaoth,<WH1034> and Sharuhen;<WH8287> thirteen<WH7969> cities<WH5892> with their villages;<WH2691>
Ain,<WH5871> Rimmon,<WH7417> Ether,<WH6281> and Ashan;<WH6228> four<WH702> cities<WH5892> with their villages;<WH2691>

and all the villages<WH2691> that were around<WH5439> these cities<WH5892> to Baalath Beer,<WH1192> Ramah<WH7414> of the South.<WH5045> This is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095> according to their families.<WH4940>

Out of the part<WH2256> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> was the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon;<WH8095> for the portion<WH2506> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> was too much<WH7227> for them.<WH1121> Therefore the children of Simeon<WH8095> had inheritance<WH5157> in the midst<WH8432> of their inheritance.<WH5157>
The third<WH7992> lot<WH1486> came up<WH5927> for the children<WH1121> of Zebulun<WH2074> according to their families.<WH4940> The border<WH1366> of their inheritance<WH5159> was to Sarid.<WH8301>

Their border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> westward,<WH3220> even to Maralah,<WH4831> and reached<WH6293> to Dabbesheth.<WH1708> It reached<WH6293> to the brook<WH5158> that is before<WH6440> Jokneam.<WH3362>

It turned<WH7725> from Sarid<WH8301> eastward<WH6924> toward the sunrise<WH4217> to the border<WH1366> of Chisloth Tabor.<WH3696> It went out<WH3318> to Daberath,<WH1705> and went up<WH5927> to Japhia.<WH3309>
From there it passed along<WH5674> eastward<WH4217> to Gath Hepher,<WH1662> to Ethkazin;<WH6278> and it went out<WH3318> at Rimmon<WH7417> which stretches to Neah.<WH5269>
The border<WH1366> turned<WH5437> around it on the north<WH6828> to Hannathon;<WH2615> and it ended<WH8444> at the valley<WH1516> of Iphtah El;<WH3317>
Kattath,<WH7005> Nahalal,<WH5096> Shimron,<WH8110> Idalah,<WH3030> and Bethlehem:<WH1035> twelve<WH8147> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
This is the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Zebulun<WH2074> according to their families,<WH4940> these cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
The fourth<WH7243> lot<WH1486> came out<WH3318> for Issachar,<WH3485> even for the children<WH1121> of Issachar<WH3485> according to their families.<WH4940>
Their border<WH1366> was to Jezreel,<WH3157> Chesulloth,<WH3694> Shunem,<WH7766>
Hapharaim,<WH2663> Shion,<WH7866> Anaharath,<WH588>
Rabbith,<WH7245> Kishion,<WH7191> Ebez,<WH77>
Remeth,<WH7432> Engannim,<WH5873> En Haddah,<WH5876> and Beth Pazzez.<WH1048>

The border<WH1366> reached<WH6293> to Tabor,<WH8396> Shahazumah,<WH7831> and Beth Shemesh.<WH1053> Their border<WH1366> ended<WH8444> at the Jordan:<WH3383> sixteen<WH8337> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
This is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Issachar<WH3485> according to their families,<WH4940> the cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
The fifth<WH2549> lot<WH1486> came out<WH3318> for the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Asher<WH836> according to their families.<WH4940>
Their border<WH1366> was Helkath,<WH2520> Hali,<WH2482> Beten,<WH991> Achshaph,<WH407>
Allammelech,<WH487> Amad,<WH6008> Mishal.<WH4861> It reached<WH6293> to Carmel<WH3760> westward,<WH3220> and to Shihorlibnath.<WH7884>

It turned<WH7725> toward the sunrise<WH4217> to Beth Dagon,<WH1016> and reached<WH6293> to Zebulun,<WH2074> and to the valley<WH1516> of Iphtah<WH3317> El northward<WH6828> to Beth Emek<WH1025> and Neiel.<WH5272> It went out<WH3318> to Cabul<WH3521> on the left hand,<WH8040>
and Ebron,<WH5683> Rehob,<WH7340> Hammon,<WH2540> and Kanah,<WH7071> even to great<WH7227> Sidon.<WH6721>

The border<WH1366> turned<WH7725> to Ramah,<WH7414> to the fortified<WH4013> city<WH5892> of Tyre;<WH6865> and the border<WH1366> turned<WH7725> to Hosah.<WH2621> It ended<WH8444> at the sea<WH3220> by the region<WH2256> of Achzib;<WH392>
Ummah<WH5981> also,<WH663> and Aphek, and Rehob:<WH7340> twenty-two<WH6242> <WH8147> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
This is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Asher<WH836> according to their families,<WH4940> these cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
The sixth<WH8345> lot<WH1486> came out<WH3318> for the children<WH1121> of Naphtali,<WH5321> even for the children<WH1121> of Naphtali<WH5321> according to their families.<WH4940>
Their border<WH1366> was from Heleph,<WH2501> from the oak<WH438> in Zaanannim,<WH6815> Adaminekeb,<WH129> <WH5346> and Jabneel,<WH2995> to Lakkum.<WH3946> It ended<WH8444> at the Jordan.<WH3383>

The border<WH1366> turned<WH7725> westward<WH3220> to Aznoth Tabor,<WH243> and went out<WH3318> from there to Hukkok.<WH2712> It reached<WH6293> to Zebulun<WH2074> on the south,<WH5045> and reached<WH6293> to Asher<WH836> on the west,<WH3220> and to Judah<WH3063> at the Jordan<WH3383> toward the sunrise.<WH4217>
The fortified<WH4013> cities<WH5892> were Ziddim,<WH6661> Zer,<WH6863> Hammath,<WH2575> Rakkath,<WH7557> Chinnereth,<WH3672>
Adamah,<WH128> Ramah,<WH7414> Hazor,<WH2674>
Kedesh,<WH6943> Edrei,<WH154> En Hazor,<WH5877>
Iron,<WH3375> Migdal<WH4027> El,<WH2765> Horem, Beth Anath,<WH1043> and Beth Shemesh;<WH1053> nineteen<WH8672> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
This is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Naphtali<WH5321> according to their families,<WH4940> the cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
The seventh<WH7637> lot<WH1486> came out<WH3318> for the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> according to their families.<WH4940>
The border<WH1366> of their inheritance<WH5159> was Zorah,<WH6881> Eshtaol,<WH847> Irshemesh,<WH5905>
Shaalabbin,<WH8169> Aijalon,<WH357> Ithlah,<WH3494>
Elon,<WH356> Timnah,<WH8553> Ekron,<WH6138>
Eltekeh,<WH514> Gibbethon,<WH1405> Baalath,<WH1191>
Jehud,<WH3055> Bene Berak,<WH1139> Gath Rimmon,<WH1667>
Me Jarkon,<WH4313> and Rakkon,<WH7542> with the border<WH1366> over against<WH4136> Joppa.<WH3305>

The border<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> went out<WH3318> beyond them;<WH1121> for the children of Dan<WH1835> went up<WH5927> and fought<WH3898> against Leshem,<WH3959> and took<WH3920> it,<WH5221> and struck it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and possessed<WH3423> it,<WH3427> and lived therein,<WH7121> and called Leshem,<WH3959> Dan,<WH1835> after the name<WH8034> of Dan<WH1835> their father.<WH1>
This is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> according to their families,<WH4940> these cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>

So they made an end<WH3615> of distributing the land<WH776> for inheritance<WH5157> by its borders.<WH1367> The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> gave<WH5414> an inheritance<WH5159> to Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126> in their midst.<WH8432>

According to the commandment<WH6310> of Yahweh,<WH3068> they gave<WH5414> him the city<WH5892> which he asked,<WH7592> even Timnathserah<WH8556> in the hill<WH2022> country of Ephraim;<WH669> and he built<WH1129> the city,<WH5892> and lived there.<WH3427>

These are the inheritances,<WH5159> which Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1>' houses of the tribes<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> distributed for inheritance<WH5157> by lot<WH1486> in Shiloh<WH7887> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150> So they made an end<WH3615> of dividing<WH2505> the land.<WH776>
